	(see to licenses\lgpl.txt for details).

* The BinaryNotes compiler  licensed under GPL v2 
		(see to licenses\gpl.txt for details).

* 3rd-party licenses
The BinaryNotes compiler uses JAXB Reference implementation (http://jaxb.dev.java.net) 
licensed under COMMON DEVELOPMENT AND DISTRIBUTION LICENSE (CDDL) Version 1.0
(see to licenses\3rdyparty\cddl.txt for details)

The BinaryNotesMQ uses HSQLDB implementation as default, but it's optionally, and maybe changed by another 
developer to another SQL DB. 
Web site: http://www.hsqldb.org
Licensed under own license terms:
See to licenses\3rdparty\hsqldb_lic.txt and licenses\3rdparty\hypersonic_lic.txt.
